DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the long-term treatment with Zomacton® for pituitary short stature in children with insufficient growth hormone production and/or short stature caused by Turner's syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Surveillance of Treatment of Children With Growth Hormone Deficiency With Zomacton®
DOC.criteria: therapeutic need according to the approved specific products characteristics (SPC) contraindication according to the SPC
